amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide funds for the Farmers Market Promotion Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section to the bill to increase the amount available by $6,000,000 under title I for "Marketing Services" under the heading "AGRICULTURAL MARKETING SERVICE" (for the Farmers Market Promotion Program and administrative expenses related to such program).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 213 (Roll no. 369).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Ms. Kaptur.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 213 (Roll no. 369).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
